Package com.composum.pages.commons.service

Interface PageManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContentManager<Page>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PagesPageManager
    public interface PageManager
extends ContentManager<Page>

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  PageManager.PageTemplateList
      A list of Pages with unique names to collect all templates available in the resolvers search paths.

      • getContainingPageResource

        @Nullable
org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource getContainingPageResource​(@Nonnull
                                                                 org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource)
        Finds the next higher parent of resource (including resource itself) that is a page respource. @see Page.isPage(Resource)

      • getPageTemplates

        Collection<Page> getPageTemplates​(@Nonnull
                                  com.composum.sling.core.BeanContext context,
                                  @Nonnull
                                  org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource parent)
        Determines all usable page templates in the context of a specific tenant. This implementation uses the resolvers search path to find all page resources in a tenants application context. Overlayed page resources are not in the result.
        Parameters:
        context - the current request context
        parent - the designated parent page
        Returns:
        the collection of all appropriate page templates found (not >null<)

      • touch

        void touch​(@Nonnull
           com.composum.sling.core.BeanContext context,
           @Nonnull
           org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource,
           @Nullable
           Calendar time)
        touches (adjusts 'jcr:lastModified') the containing page of a resource (e.g. during changes); if 'time' is null the current time is used

      • getReferrers

        @Nonnull
Collection<org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource> getReferrers​(@Nonnull
                                                                Page page,
                                                                @Nonnull
                                                                org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource searchRoot,
                                                                boolean resolved)
        retrieve the collection of referrers of a content page
        Parameters:
        page - the page
        searchRoot - the root in the repository for searching referrers
        resolved - if 'true' only active references (in the same release) are determined
        Returns:
        the collection of found resources

      • getReferences

        @Nonnull
Collection<org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource> getReferences​(@Nonnull
                                                                 Page page,
                                                                 @Nullable
                                                                 PagesConstants.ReferenceType type,
                                                                 boolean unresolved,
                                                                 boolean transitive)
        the iterator to walk through the target resources of the content elements referenced by the page
        Parameters:
        page - the page
        type - the type of references; if 'null' all types are retrieved
        unresolved - if 'true' only unresolved references (not in the same release) are determined
        transitive - if 'true' we also look for references of the references
        Returns:
        the found resources
